log_delete_failure: Failed to delete message by <@{user}> ({name}) in <#{channel}> due to missing permissions.
log_nickname_reset_failure: Failed to reset <@{user}>'s ({name}) nickname due to missing permissions.
log_nickname_kick: Kicked <@{user}> ({name}) because I failed to reset their nickname due to ratelimits.
log_nickname_ban: Banned <@{user}> ({name}) because I failed to reset their nickname due to ratelimits.
log_nickname_failure: Failed to reset <@{user}>'s ({name}) nickname due to ratelimits.
log_challenge_failure: Failed to challenge <@{user}> ({name}) due to missing permissions or ratelimits.
log_announcement_failure: Unable to send a message in <#{channel}>.
log_vote_description: Vote for The Cleaner to help us grow and protect more servers!
log_vote_footer: We will not show this reminder again for at least 3 days.
log_vote_thankyou: Thank you <@{user}> for voting on {name}, we really appreciate it <3
components_antispam_announcement:
:warning: **Spam detected!**
Sending the same message or sending multiple messages in a short time frame will result in a punishment.
components_firewall_phishing_content: Hey <@{user}>, please don't post content that is likely to be phishing.
components_firewall_phishing_domain_blac: Hey <@{user}>, please don't post content that is likely to be phishing.
components_firewall_phishing_domain_heur: Hey <@{user}>, please don't post content that is likely to be phishing.
components_firewall_phishing_embed: Hey <@{user}>, please don't post content that is likely to be phishing.
components_firewall_ping_users_many: Hey <@{user}>, please don't ping many users.
components_firewall_ping_users_few: Hey <@{user}>, please don't ping multiple users.
components_firewall_ping_roles: Hey <@{user}>, please don't ping multiple roles.
components_firewall_ping_hidden: Hey <@{user}>, please don't try to ping others while abusing client bugs.
components_firewall_advertisement_discor: Hey <@{user}>, please don't send any Discord invites.
components_firewall_emoji_mass: Hey <@{user}>, please don't send so many emojis.
components_worker_disable: Worker has been temporarily disabled due to an initialization error. Contact support for details. Disable and re-enable to force a restart.
slash_about_content: The Cleaner is a Discord bot designed to keep your server clean and safe.
slash_dashboard_guildonly: :x: This command can only be used in a server.
slash_dashboard_note: :warning: You do not have the `ADMINISTRATOR` or `MANAGE SERVER` permission, so you can not access this server's dashboard.
slash_dashboard_content: Click the button below to go to the dashboard of this server!
slash_login_content:
:warning: **Do NOT give this link to anyone!** :warning:
Sharing this link will give others full access to the settings of The Cleaner!

**Q:** What is this feature for then?
**A:** So you don't need to perform the OAuth flow on your phone which can be a bit funky at times.
slash_login_nosession: You do not have any active session, please login in a browser first.
slash_login_success:
Use the link below to login.
**Do NOT share this link with anyone**.
Our support team will **NEVER** ask for this link.
slash_internal_error:
**Internal error**: Something went wrong on our end.
Please contact support.
challenge_internal_error:
**Internal error**: Something went wrong on our end.
Please contact support.
challenge_no_settings:
**Internal error**: We have no information about the server you are in.
This should fix itself after a few minutes, contact support if it does not.
challenge_disabled: Interactive challenges have been disabled by the server staff.
challenge_no_role:
Server staff has not selected a role for me {action}.
Contact server staff and ask to complete the setup.
challenge_role_gone:
I can not find the role I am supposed to {action} you. Maybe it has been deleted?
Contact server staff and ask them to select an up-to-date role.
challenge_role_managed:
I can not {action} the role <@&{role}> because it is managed by an integration.
Contact server staff and ask them to select a role that is not managed.
challenge_role_everyone:
I can not {action} the everyone role.
Contact server staff and ask them to select a different role.
challenge_role_dangerous: The role <@&{role}> has a permission that is considered to be dangerous.
challenge_no_myself:
**Internal error**: I can not find myself.
This should fix itself after a few minutes, contact support if it does not.
challenge_hierarchy:
The role I am supposed to {action} is above me in the role hierarchy and therefore I can not {action} it.
Contact server staff and ask them to move me above the <@&{role}> role in the role settings.
challenge_no_perms:
I do not have the permission to {action} roles :slight_frown:
Contact server staff and ask them to give me the `ADMINISTRATOR` or `MANAGE ROLES` permission.
challenge_content:
Click the button below and follow the instructions on the website to verify.
*You have 5 minutes before the link becomes invalid*
challenge_embed_description:
Please verify that you are not a robot.
Start by clicking on the button below.
report_internal_error:
**Internal error**: Something went wrong on our end.
Please contact support.
report_guildonly: :x: This command can only be used in a server.
report_already: Thank you for your report, but that message has already been reported.
report_cooldown: Sorry, but you have reported too many messages recently and have to wait a bit before reporting again.
report_nobot: Sorry, but that message was sent by a bot and cannot be reported.
report_too_old: Sorry, that message is too old to be reported.
report_nomessage: Something went wrong, we couldn't find the message.
report_phishing_noperms: Sorry, but you need to have the permission to manage messages to report messages.
report_phishing_thanks:
Thank you for your report. The message has been forwarded to our team!
Please note that abuse of this feature is a violation of our [Terms of Service](https://cleanerbot.xyz/legal/terms) and can result in a ban and account suspension.
report_phishing_detected: Thank you for your report. We have improved our phishing detection and this message is now detected.
report_phishing_nolink: Sorry, but that message does not contain a link and is therefore illegible for reporting as phishing.
report_phishing_banned: Sorry, but you have been banned from reporting phishing.
report_message_nosettings:
**Internal error**: We have no information about the server you are in.
This should fix itself after a few minutes, contact support if it does not.
report_message_nomyself:
**Internal error**: I can not find myself.
This should fix itself after a few minutes, contact support if it does not.
report_message_channelnotfound: The channel I send reports to has been deleted.
report_message_noperms: I do not have permissions to send reports in the reports channel.
report_message_thanks: Thank you for your report. The message has been forwarded to our team!
report_message_modal_placeholder: Give a reason why you want to report this message. Something like 'advertising'.
report_message_modal_expired: Modal expired. Please submit your report within 15 minutes.
report_message_action_reason: Action taken due to a message report
report_message_action_placeholder: Select an action to take against the message author
report_message_action_kick_notfound: User not found. Maybe they left?
report_message_action_kick_failed: Failed to kick <@{user}> due to missing permissions.
report_message_action_ban_failed: Failed to ban <@{user}> due to missing permissions.
report_message_action_timeout_day_notfou: User not found. Maybe they left?
report_message_action_timeout_day_failed: Failed to timeout <@{user}> due to missing permissions.
report_message_action_timeout_week_notfo: User not found. Maybe they left?
report_message_action_timeout_week_faile: Failed to timeout <@{user}> due to missing permissions.
